string-array.name: planet_description
string-array.item: Mercury is the smallest and fastest planet, closest to the Sun, with extreme temperatures.
Venus is the Earth\'s "sister planet," covered in thick clouds, with the hottest surface in the solar system.
Earth, the only known planet with life, covered in vast oceans and a breathable atmosphere.
Mars is known as the "Red Planet," known for its dusty landscape, ice caps, and the possibility of past water.
Jupiter is the largest planet, with powerful storms like the Great Red Spot and dozens of moons.
Saturn is famous for its stunning ring system, this gas giant has over 80 known moons.
Uranus, a blue-green ice giant that rotates on its side, giving it unique seasons.
Neptune, the windiest planet, known for its deep blue color and powerful storms
